name: DeathBlox - دث بلوكس
description:
اللعبة متوفرة باللغة العربية والانجليزية

هذي اللعبة هي مشاركة في زنقة الالعاب ١١.

كل مرة تموت وتعيد الحلقة تلقى مكعب فالمكان اللي مت فيه! استعمل هذي القوة لصالحك لكي تفوز في كل ال٥ مراحل فاللعبة!

يمكنك ان تفوز في كل المراحل ويبقالك حياة زيادة.

التحكمات: wasd أو الأسهم للحركة وزر مسافة للقفز.

Game available in Arabic and English.

This game is a submission to Game Zanga 11.

Every time you die and come back, you find a block in the same place you died in, use this to your advantage and complete the 5 levels!

All levels can be finished with at least 1 life to spare.

Controls - Arrow keys or WASD to move, space to jump

Credits:

Design,Code,Music,and Sound Design by Abdullah Alwakeel

Fonts - Bitsy Arabic 2 by AlexClay (itch.io)

Tileset - 8x8 Castle by Gravity Games Interactive (OpenGameArt)

Background - Cavern by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz) (itch.io)

Sprites - Black Mage by GenericNPC (from OpenGameArt)

Arabic Support for Godot by Mohammad Reza Baghbani

Made with Godot 3.4.4
